description: Manage the Communication Resource's managed identities.

commands.name: az communication identity assign
commands.summary: Assign a managed identity to the Communication Resource.
commands.syntax:
az communication identity assign --name
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--user-assigned]

commands.name: az communication identity remove
commands.summary: Remove a managed identity from the communication resource.
commands.syntax:
az communication identity remove --name
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--user-assigned]

commands.name: az communication identity show
commands.summary: Show the Communication Resource's managed identities.

commands.name: az communication identity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
